content: **skill level** advanced beginner **materials** * j/6 mm crochet hook for the hat * worsted weight yarn i used lion brand yarns wool ease * tapestry needle * stitch markers optional **gauge** 11 stitches = 3 inches **finished sizes** toddler child and adult **yardage** i do not have the exact yardage information for this pattern however you can make several crochet headband patterns out of one skein of yarn
